Text: thx but am wunder if series?
^ If you're wondering if it's a series (and I didn't misunderstand), the answer is no. It's just a movie made for TV, no other parts following it.
Thanks for the upload, but this isn't HDTV. It's 688x288TV. Just sayin. Nevertheless, I appreciate it :).

BONE means it was recorded from an HDTV broadcast (just like the TV torrents you see here that say HDTV) but it is not in an HD resolution, a torrent will say 720P or 1080P (I've even seen 576P and 480P) in the title generally if it's in HD
why does it say it's only 97 min when on imdb it says 134(ish) min ????

@jinXc - What good is to declare it was ripped from HDTV if it's not 720p?? The name of the release is in did deceiving and should have been TVRip.
hanks anyway @.BONE.
